pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可忍耐的；可容忍的；可忍受得了的
遭受，忍受；受痛苦；经验；受损害

word_group.brief_definition: 人类痛苦；人类苦难；人类的苦难
疼痛和痛苦；痛苦和苦难；疼痛和苦难
苦难和痛苦；痛苦和折磨
遭受腕道症；遭受屈肌管
病人的痛苦；患者的痛苦

bilingual.source: Of course, I hope none of you have to go through the same kind of suffering that I did.
bilingual.target: 当然，我希望你们都不必经历我所经历的痛苦。

bilingual.source: His suffering was evident in his eyes.
bilingual.target: 他的眼睛里明显流露出痛苦。
他对别人的痛苦冷酷无情。

bilingual.source: She prayed for deliverance from her suffering.
bilingual.target: 她祈求从痛苦中得到解救。

bilingual.source: He chose euthanasia to end his suffering.
bilingual.target: 他选择了安乐死来结束自己的痛苦。
难民们正在经历巨大的痛苦。

bilingual.source: He endured a lot of suffering during his illness.
bilingual.target: 他在生病期间忍受了很多痛苦。

bilingual.source: The war brought untold suffering to the people.
bilingual.target: 战争给人民带来了数不清的痛苦。

bilingual.source: It is distressing to see so many people suffering.
bilingual.target: 看到这么多人受苦是令人痛苦的。

bilingual.source: The movie portrays the suffering of war victims.
bilingual.target: 这部电影描绘了战争受害者的痛苦。

list.abstract: Suffering（英[ˈsʌfərɪŋ]，美[ˈsʌfərɪŋ]），英语单词，作形容词用，为患病的；受苦的。作名词用，为苦难；受苦；苦楚。作及物动词用，为忍受；遭受；容忍。短语搭配有suffering from（患有；遭受；患），例句为“It is suffering a great deal from the incident.（这一事件使它深受其害。）” Suffering名词类近义词有martyrdom，形容词类近义词有stricken、sickening，sufferings为Suffering的复数形式。

yingyinNormal.en: I want every camera watching. We will turn their advance into a celebration of suffering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要每一个摄像机都开着，我们将把他们的前进变成痛苦的狂欢。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a story we tell ourselves. And every story needs a beginning. Your imagined suffering makes you lifelike.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个我们对自己讲述的故事，而每个故事都需要一个开头，你想象的痛苦使得你更像真人。

yingyinNormal.en: But according to this, you were also experiencing intense grief and suffering. Can you explain those emotions in this context, Maeve? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但根据这些看来,你还经历过强烈的悲伤和痛苦,你能解释下这些情感的来源吗，梅芙？不能。

yingyinNormal.en: That was Arnold's key insight, the thing that led the hosts to their awakening, suffering. The pain that the world is not as you want it to be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是阿诺德的关键见解，是可以导致接待员们觉醒的东西，苦难折磨，察觉到世界并非如你希望那般后的痛苦。

yingyinNormal.en: Your humanity is cost-effective. So is your suffering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的人性很节省成本，你的受难也一样。

yingyinNormal.en: What are the other kingdoms? Are they suffering the same?
yingyinNormal.zh: 其他王国情况如何？也受到同样的攻击？

yingyinNormal.en: Is Penny crying? No. No, of course not. They thrive on our suffering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮泪崩了吗？没有。她当然不会哭啦，女人巴不得看我们受折磨。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. That is the reason. My work is suffering because of all the laid I'm getting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，就是因为这个，我的专业水准降低，就是因为巫山云雨乐不思蜀。

yingyinNormal.en: For the past three years, my mother has been suffering from intermittent lymphoma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这三年来我母亲一直在与间歇性淋巴癌做抗争。

yingyinNormal.en: Doctors killed 1,807 people last year in Belgium. Some only suffering from depression.
yingyinNormal.zh: 医生们去年在比利时终结了1807人的生命，其中有些人仅仅是患有抑郁症。

yingyinNormal.en: Let the U-boats sink the convoy. Look, it's been a big day maybe you're suffering from...
yingyinNormal.zh: 让德军潜艇攻击海军部。听着，今天发生了太多事情，也许你……

yingyinNormal.en: And to my mutant brothers and sisters out there, I say this: No more hiding. No more suffering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也是对变种人兄弟姐妹们的召唤，我和你们说别再隐藏了，别再受苦了。

yingyinNormal.en: Who ever said I was merciful? And it's not my fault you're suffering. You used to be beautiful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁告诉你我仁慈了，你受难又不是我的错，你以前可美了。

yingyinNormal.en: Billions of lives lost to fire, famine, suffering on a global scale. The fallout was unimaginable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无数人在烈火中失去生命，饥荒，灾难在全球蔓延，惨不忍睹。

yingyinNormal.en: Maggie, dear, there are people in there suffering. I can bring their fever down and keep them stable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 玛吉，亲爱的，那里有很多人饱受煎熬，我能帮他们退烧，维持性命。

yingyinNormal.en: He poisoned the water supply, bringing on the dark ages. Death and disease and suffering ran rampant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在水源下了毒，带来了黑暗时期，死亡，疾病，肆意猖獗。

yingyinNormal.en: But you turned your back! You, turned away from the suffering of my people and the inferno that destroyed us!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你却袖手旁观，你转身离去，让我的人民饱受煎熬，面对毁灭家园的地狱之火。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. We're, going to the movies. No, we're not. We're standing in the hallway, suffering through an awkward encounter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿。我们赶着去看电影。才怪，我们站在走廊里忍受你们尴尬的相遇。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, well, excuse me for not wanting to live in a world where people can commit crimes without suffering the consequences. You are a criminal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗，原谅我不想活在这种人犯了罪，还不会受惩罚的地方你是个罪犯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

examination_example.sentence: Eating less meat is good because it reduces environmental harm and animal <highlight>suffering</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 少吃肉是有益的，因为它可以减少对环境的伤害和动物的痛苦。

examination_example.sentence: The Funeral March is not the last movement of the Eroica Symphony, so that <highlight>suffering</highlight> does not have the last word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《葬礼进行曲》没有成为《英雄交响曲》的最后乐章，因此苦难就不会是最终结局。

examination_example.sentence: One could interpret much of the work of Beethoven that <highlight>suffering</highlight> is inevitable, but the courage to fight it renders life worth living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们可以将贝多芬的很多作品解释为——苦难是难免的，但是与苦难抗争的勇气使得生活值得继续。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

sense_info_list.en: an experience that is painful or distressing

examination_example.sentence: As long as robots add to the sum of human happiness, reduce <highlight>suffering</highlight>, and create time to read world-class journalism, we should be their fans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要机器人能增加人类的幸福感，减少痛苦并为阅读世界级的新闻创造时间，我们就应该成为他们的粉丝。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 经受；使遭受；忍受；允许；患病；容许；变差；变糟；准许；受病痛折磨

examination_example.sentence: There's tremendous opportunity to get a generation of people for whom <highlight>suffering</highlight> isn't their thing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有巨大的机会让这一代人不再受痛苦的折磨。

examination_example.sentence: Those <highlight>suffering</highlight> inherited financial anxiety tend to follow one of two patterns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些患有遗传性财务焦虑症的人倾向于符合以下任一种模式。

examination_example.sentence: Ebike riders get the enjoyable part of cycling without the massive <highlight>suffering</highlight> of climbing huge hills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电动自行车的骑手可以享受骑车的乐趣，而且不用忍受爬山的巨大痛苦。

sense_info_list.en: an experience that is painful or distressing
